official_title: Joint resolution providing for the designation of the week beginning October 3, 1977, and ending October 9, 1977, as "National Gifted Children Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to designate the week beginning October 3, 1977, and ending October 9, 1977, as "National Gifted Children Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution providing for the designation of the week beginning October 3, 1977, and ending October 9, 1977, as "National Gifted Children Week".
